name: Project: Hide
description:
Hey Welcome to Project Hides page, Project Hide is very much a shell of a full game and is still under heavy development. However i wanted to put the idea out there and show what is to come.

Currently you can :

-Play with boxes

-Talk to NPC's

-Explore the ship

At the current state the game is mostly empty but i have plans for multiple additions, I will list them below :

-Add second level to ship

-Quest line system where the player must do things around the ship

-A trator or two atempting to stop the player

-More Npcs

Those are just some of the first additions I want to make. The game is very short and like i said not much to do ... yet. Id love if you can give the game a try and share some feed back on things that you feel would improve the game.
